com.enjin.sdk.schemas.shared.arguments

Interface PlayerFragmentArguments<T extends WalletFragmentArguments<T>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the implementing class
    All Superinterfaces:
    AssetFragmentArguments<T>, VariableHolder<T>, WalletFragmentArguments<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GetPlayer, GetPlayer, GetPlayers

    public interface PlayerFragmentArguments<T extends WalletFragmentArguments<T>>
extends WalletFragmentArguments<T>
    Fragment interface used to request certain information from players returned by the platform.
    See Also:
    Player

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default T qrSize(java.lang.Integer size)
      Sets the desired size of the QR image in pixels.
      default T withLinkingInfo()
      Sets the request to include the linking information with the player.
      default T withWallet()
      Sets the request to include the wallet with the player.
